Package backpack

Class Robot

java.lang.Object
simbad.sim.BaseObject
simbad.sim.SimpleAgent
simbad.sim.Agent
backpack.Robot
public class Robot
extends simbad.sim.Agent
Describes custom Agent objects with a preset of sensors and specific behavior.

  • Method Details

    • initBehavior

      public void initBehavior()
      Set of actions to be taken once in the beginning of the simulation.
      Overrides:
      initBehavior in class simbad.sim.Agent

    • performBehavior

      public void performBehavior()
      Describes the agent's behavior according to its interactions with its Environment. This method is being executed continuously as the agent's sensory data updates and its actuators take action.
      Overrides:
      performBehavior in class simbad.sim.Agent

    • followTheLine

      public void followTheLine()
      Describes the agent's behavior when it has not encountered an obstacle.

    • followTheLight

      public void followTheLight()
      Describes the agent's behavior when it has not encountered an obstacle and is not tracing a line.

    • circumNavigate

      public void circumNavigate​(simbad.sim.RangeSensorBelt sonars, boolean CLOCKWISE)
      Describes the agent's behavior for obstacle avoidance.
      Parameters:
      sonars - Sonar sensors on this agent.
      CLOCKWISE - Describes which direction to trail the obstacle towards.

    • weighLux

      public double weighLux()
      Returns:
